title.narrative: Empowering women peace ambassadors for effective participation in peace building

description.narrative: This project is focusing on empowering women for constructive and productive participation in peace building. The goal of the project is “Strengthening women capacities for delivering peace in their respective communities”. Women are influencers in majority of South Sudan society/communities, but the issue is they were not provided the opportunity for effective participation in public life with intention of fostering peaceful co-existences. The lack of effective women participation in the process of fostering peaceful co-existence among communities was due to cultural and traditional perceptions of the society since leadership is based on male dominance in most of the communities of South Sudan. Therefore, public participation and engagement is more of male having greater chance than women. Due to this imbalance in the society, this project is intending to empowered women in the communities.Across the country the on-going violence resulted to rampant violation of the women human rights. Evidences generated by our 2018 workshops on women participation in peace building demonstrated that women representation and participation in communal peace dialogue is inadequate in both terms as facilitators or participants of the communal peace dialogue. Further, the women complained of their inadequate or low participation and representation in communal peace dialogue has contributed greatly for the community to undermine the special needs of women for peace and security. The women participants in CEPO 2018 peace building workshop consistently complained of all peace dialogue resolutions turn to be gender bias with high focus on drawing solutions on issues that are more of male needs and concerns driven in the communities. Based on this position of the women in Bor, Torit, Juba and Wau CEPO decided to establish specific mechanism that focus on lifting women voice on demanding genuine and effective participation and representation on matters of peace and security.
